QUOC HUNG DANG
about me
Hello, my name is Hung Dang, I'm a young designer with
creative and passion on my blood who always try to catch up
new things beside make client happy with my artwork. I have
a few years experience in this industry but I always feel everything
is so fresh and I have to learn more and more to be fullfl my skills
and pleasure my ambitions.
